title: 惠譽下調港銀行業評級　指中港融合帶來風險

replies.msg:
https://www.post852.com/249533/惠譽下調港銀行業評級　指中港融合帶來風險/



國際評級機構惠譽昨日宣布，由於香港銀行業務轉趨中國市場，而且集中於地產，將其營運環境評估由A+級降至A級，前景則由負面轉為。惠譽認為，香港與中國在經濟及金融上進一步融合，對香港監管和法律框架的穩定性、效率和獨立性帶來風險。另外，中國的結構性和經濟周期下滑亦很可能影響香港。

惠譽又指，本港銀行業的子公司於大陸設立的子公司，均受中國監管機構監管，但其標準可能與香港金管局有別，意味金管局依賴中方合作，亦難以中國風險帶來緩衝。


Eddie Wong:
上文 「前景則由負面轉為」？？

Duke Lilomei:
Downgrade from 'a+/negative' to 'a' with stable.
The exact wording is: The affirmations are in spite of Fitch's downward adjustment of its assessment of the operating environment for Hong Kong banks to a mid-point of 'a' with stable trend from 'a+/negative'. The revision primarily captures the growing connectivity between the economies and financial systems of Hong Kong and China. Our assessment takes into account Hong Kong's high macro-prudential risk due to above-trend credit growth and significant spill-over risks from high property price inflation and rising household debt, notwithstanding Hong Kong banks' relatively small direct exposure. https://www.fitchratings.com/site/pr/10029582
